daruwage upathe sita ohu sidukarana kriyawan ,prathicharayan saha wardhana wenaskam pilibandawa demawpiyan nirantharawa wimasilimathwa sitiya yuthu wana athara apage idiri lipi magin ee sandaha obata mana mangapenwimak labadimata api balaporoththu wemu.emagin lamayinta athiwana wiwidha manasika sankulatha kalin handunaganima saha ee sandaha nisi waidya upades kara yomuwimata hakiwe.ee athara adhi kriyakarithwaya, otisam thathwayan,aspergers sindromaya aadiwu thathwayan dakwiya haka.mita amatharawa nisi aakarayata daruwa aahara ganimata purudu kirima, wasikili yamata purudu kirima, nodani muthra pitakirima palanaya aadiwu noyekuth yahapath saukhya purudu puhunu kirimath lama manasika suwathawayen iganwe.

kolambaa maha nagara sabhawata rupiyal koti gananak watina wahana 35 k miladi ganimata adala 2013 sammuthiyata patahaniwa eeye (25) pawathi maha sabha raswimata aluthin sanshodhitha yojanawak gena eemen sabhawa ekama gala gottiyak bawata path wiya.sabhawe athi wu ekama galagottiya hethuwen sanshodhitha yojanawa nyaya pathrayen iwath kara ganimata nagaradhipathi ee .je .em musammil mahathata sidu wiya.sabhawe nosansunthawa hethuwen nagaradhipathiwaraya kal wela athiwa diwa wiwekaya sadaha sabhawa kal thabu athara prashnaya samathayakata path kara ganima sadaha nagaradhipathiwaraya kadawu paksha nayaka sakachchawa wipakshaya warjanaya keleya.diwa wiwekayen pasu niyojya nagaradhipathi yu .el .tayitas perera mahatha sabhawa meheya wuwada wipakshaya sabhawa warjanaya keleya..
